attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Today`s its reported the slaughter of a 2 year old baby "Casey Leigh in Leeds.This innocent baby was deliberately used as a sex object,then massacred. Please for her insist on the return of Hanging or Lethal Injection.
Can you visualize the horror and pain that little baby girl endured,then recognise the penalty for the pervert  spending whatever time in a Prison Community with TV,DVD,Games,Food and Warmth,Health Care,Its up to everyone with a conscience to protect those unable to defend themselves from such vile opportunists in the UK
Its not the right of Politicians,or Church Leaders to decide on this subject because can you be certain they themselves have the required degree of conscience to decide.Its up to you to give baby Casey 2 minutes of your time,and the horrors,which I know you will never experience,and if "Big Brother" can get millions of votes surely Baby Casey can provide the effort from you to push for the return of hanging or lethal injection.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
